form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION, N-400 ( (Rev. 11-26-79)N

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/28/2023 do UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form Approved IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE OMB NO. 43-R0079 FEE STAMP APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION Mail or take to: system 28 1982 IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE ALIEN REGISTRATION Show the exact spelling of your name as it appears on your alien registration (See INSTRUCTIONS. BE SURE YOU UNDERSTAND EACH receipt card, and the number of your card. If you did not register, so state.) QUESTION BEFORE YOU ANSWER IT. PLEASE PRINT OR Name TRAN , CHINH VAN TYPE.) No. A21-202-116 Section of Law 316(a) Date: 2-15-82 (Leave Blank) (1) My full true and correct name is CHINH VAN TRAN (2) I now live at 752 SOUTH (Full MARIPOSA true name without abbreviations ,Apt # 205 (Number and street, Los angeler (L.A. Co. ) Ca 90005 City county, state, zip code) (3) I was born on 7 14 15 in nam Dinh- - Vietnam (Month) (Day) (Year) (City or town) ( County, province, or state) (Country) (4) I request that my name be changed to none (5) Other names I have used are: none (Include maiden name) Sex: Male Female and (6) Was your father or mother ever a United States citizen? Yes No (If "Yes", explain fully) (7) Can you read and write English? Yes No 8) Can you speak English? Yes No (9) Can you sign your name in English? Yes No (10) My lawful admission for permanent residence was on 27 1975 under the name of TRAN, CHINH VAN (Month) Year) at HHM (Day) (City) (La Fayette (State) - Indiana) (11) Since that date I have resided continuously in the United States and continuously in the State of California where I now live since. Jan 1980 During the last five years I have been physically present in the United States for a total of 60 months. 12) Do you intend to reside permanently in the United States? Yes No If "No," explain: (13) In what places in the United States have you lived during the last 5 years? List present address FIRST. NAME OF SHIP, OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, Bus DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY, UNITED STATES OR OTHER MEANS USED TO self RETURN TO THE PLACE OR RETURNED PORT OF TO ENTRY THE UNITED THROUGH STATES WHICH You VW (b) Since your lawful admission, have you been out of the United States for a period of 6 months or longer? Yes No If "No", state "None"; If "Yes", fill in following information for every absence of more than 6 months.
